MemberSignature.Value: public static void WriteUnifiedDiff (string[] leftLines, string leftName, string[] rightLines, string rightName, System.IO.TextWriter writer, int context, bool caseSensitive, bool compareWhitespace);

Docs.param: The lines of the left document.
The name of the left document.
The lines of the right document.
The name of the right document.
The output TextWriter.
The number of context lines to include.
Whether the comparisons are case-sensitive.
Whether the comparison should be aware of changes in whitespace.
Docs.summary: Writes out a line-by-line diff in unified diff format for the two documents, specifying whether the comparison is case-sensitive and whitespace-sensitive and the number of context lines.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void WriteUnifiedDiff (string leftFile, string rightFile, System.IO.TextWriter writer, int context, bool caseSensitive, bool compareWhitespace);

Docs.param: The file name for the left document.
The file name for the right document.
The output TextWriter.
The number of lines of context to include.
Whether the comparisons are case-sensitive.
Whether the comparison should be aware of changes in whitespace.
Docs.summary: Writes out a line-by-line diff in unified diff format for the two files, specifying whether the comparison is case-sensitive and whitespace-sensitive.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void WriteUnifiedDiff (Algorithm.Diff.Diff diff, System.IO.TextWriter writer);

Docs.param: A Diff object that already has the differences between two documents.
The output TextWriter.
Docs.summary: Writes a diff in unified diff format to a TextWriter.
Docs.remarks: The default number of lines of context is used.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void WriteUnifiedDiff (Algorithm.Diff.Diff diff, System.IO.TextWriter writer, string fromfile, string tofile, int context);

Docs.param: A Diff object that already has the differences between two documents.
The output TextWriter.
The name of the left document.
The name of the right document.
The number of lines of context to include.
Docs.summary: Writes a diff in unified diff format to a TextWriter with the give file names and context.
A utility class for generating diffs in the unified diff format.
Docs.remarks: This class has several static members for outputting s in the unified diff format.
